?^sb_hg6KM@Uah88sk}h: Once upon a time,\ a human|fell into the underground.
Injured by their fall,\ they|cried out for help.
Hearing the human's call,\|the monster prince ASRIEL|came to their rescue...
And they became BEST FRIENDS.
But the world did not care.\|It took everything from them.
The prince,\ too WEAK and|IDIOTIC to fight back,\ died|in vain.
It was only when he learned|to take what he TRULY|deserved...
That he became powerful|enough to claim what was|his.
To make his own rules.\|His own hopes.\|His own dreams.
His own,\ greater reality.
Don't you get it,\ Chara?
I've done all of this for|you.\ For us.
After ALL the pain we|suffered through,\ this is|our chance for TRUE freedom.
So why...?\\\|Why can't we just be friends|again...?
Okay.\|I have NO idea what's going|on here.
And if I don't know what's|going on,\ YOU sure won't|unless you've read the full|story at invertedfate.com.
Yes,\ I mean the webcomic,\|NOT just the videos.
This is part 5 of the|"null arc,"\ over 66 chapters|in if you count all the|bonuses and interludes.
That trial segment?\|Also canon.\|It's Chapter 36.
But if you wanna skip ahead,\|that's on you.\|It'll be FUN to watch you|squirm in the comments.
Seriously,\ though.\|What's up with all these|robots?
...Whatever.\|Let's just get this over with.
